medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Dyspnoea developed in the renal unit in June 2012. The patient experienced reduced oxygen saturations and respiratory symptoms following the diagnosis of miliary tuberculosis in May 2012. Symptoms were aggravated by a large left pleural effusion, which improved after drainage.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertensive nephropathy since February 2011; diagnosed with miliary tuberculosis in May 2012.
medical_history.social_history: The patient had been living in the UK for 30 years with no tuberculosis contacts.
